'Charon' is the largest satellite of the dwarf planet Pluto. It was discovered
in 1978 at the United States Naval Observatory Flagstaff Station (NOFS).
Following the 2005 discovery of two other natural satellites of Pluto (Nix and
Hydra), in 2011, a fourth, S/2011 P 1, and on July 11, 2012, a fifth satellite
S/2012 P 1, Charon may also be referred to as '(134340) Pluto I'. The [[New Horizons]] mission is scheduled to visit Charon
and Pluto in July 2015.
headings: Classification as a moon or dwarf planet
